title: Character Concept - Mage
description:
Character concept for a client's game project,

The task was to create a mage based character that does not have usual signifiers of a mage.
I had a lot of fun making this concept and I learned a lot from it!

title: Action shot
description:
Action shot of gameplay a concept done for a client.

I combined photo bashing and painting techniques in grayscale, then added colors trough gradient maps and blending modes. Overpaint to connect everything together.

title: Semi realism concepts
description:
Art style exploration done for a client.

The setting is dark medieval world with hints of industrial revolution, color palette was inspired by Bekinski's art but darker and a bit desaturated.

Done with photobashing and a paintover. Used Zbrush and Blender for some parts.

title: Alien Concept
description:
Sculpt and polypaint practice for final chapter of Nexttut's Zbrush course. 
I learned a lot and I really love the program now!
The task was to design our own alien. I took Alien the series and mushrooms for design reference.

title: Columns
description: ZBrush practice, going trough Nexttut's ZBrush course to refresh my knowledge and learn a few new things!

title: Minotaur Bust Sculpt
description: A sculpt for practice, I'm slowly falling in love with Zbrush

title: Dark Urge: Wine and Blood
description: Ever since playing Baldur's Gate Dark Urge run, I had this idea in my brain, and I'm satisfied how it turned out, I can rest easily now.

title: Underground science lab concept
description:
Concept done for Immunauts.
This was really fun to make, I got to make 2D sketch first then did a scene in 3D in Blender.

title: Spaceship Submarine concepts
description: Rough concepts done for project Immonauts

title: Spyro the dragon
description: Spyro the dragon sculpt made for fun in Zbrush.

title: Feline Skull
description: Started learning Zbrush, it's pretty cool!

title: Ark Fantastic - Environment
description:
Concepts and Illustrations I did for a game back in 2021-2022.
I learned a lot about background design and adapting character designs for animation.
You can read more about the project here:
https://www.tripthearkfantastic.com

title: Charles character sheet
description:
Concepts and Illustrations I did for a game back in 2021-2022.
I learned a lot about background design and adapting character designs for animation.
You can read more about the project here:
https://www.tripthearkfantastic.com

title: Fantasy dagger
description:
Wanted to practice more Warcraft style texturing on the weekend. Sculpted and modelled in Blender, textured in Substance Painter.
Design by Sean Dunny.

title: Orc
description:
Mainly learned character sculpting in Blender and some modeling techniques with Grant Abbitt. I also learned that my PC is in critical need of an upgrade haha.
I'd usually use substance painter for texturing, but  the course used Blender for texturing this time.
The model is not game-ready, it needs a proper retopo and optimization.

title: Shield
description: A little modelling and texturing practice. Still needs a little optimising before it could be game ready.

title: Viking Axe
description: Viking axe from Grant Abbitt's tutorial I practiced along while ago.

title: Flirty Devil
description:
Sculpture based on a concept piece from Sasha Tudvaseva, with my own twist on the overall look.
Really wanted to give sculpting a try, it took me about 4 hours on the weekend. 

Sculpted and vertex painted in Blender.

title: Stylized Viking Helmet
description:
I tried to make something stylized and game-ready without a tutorial this time, and also applied what I’ve learned in the past month in Substance painter and Blender to see gaps in my knowledge. Wanted to try hand painting as well! It was a lot of fun to make and I really enjoyed the process 

The original design that was used as reference is Dmytro Dovgan’s! https://www.artstation.com/artwork/R15Or

title: A.I.M-33
description:
Artificial Intelligence Maintenence machine, Model 33 (Or how I'd call them, Aimee)
Modeled in Blender and Textured in Substance for practice.

title: Game Concepts - Ark Fantastic
description:
Concepts and Illustrations I did for a game back in 2021-2022.
I learned a lot about background design and adapting character designs for animation.

You can read more about the project here:
https://www.tripthearkfantastic.com

title: Opera Game Concepts
description:
Concepts I made for a game for a client back in 2021.
Had quite a lot of fun working on these stylized characters.

title: Backgrounds
description:
Process and final result of a background concept I worked on for a game.
I learned a lot through this piece and it pushed my limits, but it was fun working on it nonetheless.

title: Splash practice
description: A gift for a friend, also practice

title: Dualitatem
description: Wanted to do a card-like illustration.

title: Ghost Fish
description: A little color exercise I did

title: Elf Archer
description: Elf Archer with a magical bow concept

title: Undead Rogue
description: A gift for someone I care deeply for. This is his rogue main from the game World of Warcraft.

title: Destiny 2 Titan
description:
What does it mean to be a Titan?

As a Titan, you are a part of the city - in a way no Warlock or hunter could ever understand.
The dream of the city rests upon our shoulders. So has it ever been with the Sunbreakers. 
The Hammer of Sol is a flame in the darkness. But fire burns without thought. 

My Titan - Alexandria. c: Accumulation of what I've learned in past few weeks.

Destiny the game belongs to Bungie
